LIST
===============
*Basado en "R for data Science", by Hadley Wickham*

# 1.Create and show Lists
```{r}
x1 <- list(c(1, 2), c(3, 4))
x2 <- list(list(1, 2), list(3, 4))
x3 <- list(1, list(2, list(3)))


```

#2. Subsetting ("utils" packages)
```{r}
a <- list(a = 1:3, b = "a string", c = pi, d = list(-1, -5))

str(a[1:2])

```
